data.convo: I really like my debate class . Do you think you'll be interested in studying law later ? I've entertained the idea . But I'm I leaning more toward politics . You want to be a politician ? Yuck . That's not like you to generalize . Sorry , you're right . I think you'll be a good politician . I think I can do a lot of good for our country . You're right . We need more people like you in politics .
